Environment News
James Van Der Beek was reportedly working on a memoir prior to his death
14 Feb:
The actor - who was best known for playing Dawson Leery in the hit TV series Dawson's Creek - died on Wednesday (11.02.26) after being diagnosed with stage 3 colorectal cancer back in August 2023 and now a new report has suggested he was writing a book about his life prior to his passing....
more
Valentino Guseli thought he saw an 'omen from the shred gods' during the 2026 Winter Olympics halfpipe final
14 Feb:
As Valentino Guseli watched his teammate Scotty James "tearing" the halfpipe apart, he thought an "omen from the shred gods" would deliver him an elusive Olympic gold medal....
more
Alfonso Ribeiro will "always be there" for James Van Der Beek's kids following the actor's death
14 Feb:
The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air star has been left devastated following the loss of the Dawson's Creek actor - who died this week three years after being diagnosed with stage 3 colorectal cancer back in August 2023 - and he's now promised to support James' wife Kimberly and the couple's six children as they navigate life without him....
more
Authorities believe Savannah Guthrie's missing mother Nancy is still alive
14 Feb:
The Today show host's 84-year-old mother has been missing since February 1, with the Pima County Sheriff's Department and the FBI investigating her disappearance....
more
Two sailors have been hospitalised after a nasty crash between the Black Foils and France, forcing the cancellation of racing for the day at the Auckland Sail GP event
14 Feb:
Two sailors have been hospitalised after a nasty crash between the Black Foils and France, forcing the cancellation of racing for the day at the Auckland Sail GP event...
more
Bijou Phillips has launched an urgent appeal to find a kidney donor
14 Feb:
The 45-year-old actress was born with underdeveloped kidneys and previously underwent a transplant in 2017 after being gifted an organ by a "dear friend" but she's now back in hospital in Los Angeles receiving dialysis after complications led to her body rejecting the transplanted kidney - and she's appealed for help to find a living donor who can help....
more
The US government has just entered another shutdown. Here's what it means this time
14 Feb:
After Congress failed to pass laws necessary to fully fund the US government, one of its biggest departments has shut down....
more
News Chiefs recruit Kyren Taumoefolau is looking to continue his momentum after being named to start on the right wing for tonight's Super Rugby Pacific clash with the Blues in Auckland
14 Feb:
News Chiefs recruit Kyren Taumoefolau is looking to continue his momentum after being named to start on the right wing for tonight's Super Rugby Pacific clash with the Blues in Auckland...
more
Stacy Keibler says it was a "gift from God" to be with James Van Der Beek in his "final days"
14 Feb:
The former WWE star paid tribute to her late friend after the Dawson's Creek star died on Wednesday (11.02.26) aged 48 after being diagnosed with stage 3 colorectal cancer back in August 2023....
more
